data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Tripoli. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tripoli, Libya
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,687 believers in Tripoli to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Tripoli, Libya.
Father, may the churches in Tripoli, Libya honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bedouin, Fezzan people. Make the Bedouin, Fezzan people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,039,048, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 1,687 believers in Tripoli, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Tripoli, Libya.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
